name: Automated Lead Capture, Scoring & CRM Integration with HubSpot, Clearbit & Slack

user.name: shae
user.bio: Full-stack automation expert combining n8n, frontend & backend development, and hard-coded solutions to build powerful, scalable workflows. Skilled in data parsing (PDF/Excel), API integrations (banking, property, financial), email systems, and real-time sync. I create custom dashboards, API layers, and advanced automations that go beyond ‚Äúno-code,‚Äù

description:
How it works
This Lead Capture & Auto-Qualification workflow transforms raw leads into qualified prospects through intelligent automation. Here's the high-level flow:
Lead Intake ‚Üí Data Validation ‚Üí Enrichment ‚Üí Scoring ‚Üí Smart Routing ‚Üí CRM Integration & Notifications
The system captures leads from any source, validates the data, enriches it with company intelligence, scores based on qualification criteria, and automatically routes high-value prospects to sales while nurturing lower-priority leads.
Set up steps
Time to set up: Approximately 30-45 minutes
Prerequisites: Active accounts with HubSpot, Clearbit, Apollo, and Slack
Step 1: Import Workflow (2 minutes)

Copy the workflow JSON and import into your n8n instance
The workflow will appear with all nodes and sticky note documentation

Step 2: Configure Environment Variables (5 minutes)
Set these in your n8n environment:

APOLLO_API_URL
SLACK_SALES_CHANNEL_ID
SLACK_MARKETING_CHANNEL_ID
CRM_ASSIGNMENT_URL

Step 3: Set Up API Credentials (15 minutes)
Create credential connections for:

Clearbit API (enrichment)
Apollo API (HTTP Header Auth)
HubSpot API (CRM integration)
Slack API (notifications)

Step 4: Customize Scoring Logic (10 minutes)

Review the qualification criteria in the Code node
Adjust scoring weights based on your ideal customer profile
Modify industry targeting and company size thresholds

Step 5: Test & Activate (8 minutes)

Send test webhook requests to validate the flow
Verify CRM contact creation and Slack notifications
Activate the workflow for live lead processing

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

parameters.content:
## Lead Capture & Auto-Qualification Workflow

**Purpose:** Automatically capture leads from multiple sources, enrich with company data, qualify based on criteria, and route to appropriate sales actions.

**Security:** Uses environment variables for API keys - no hardcoded credentials!

**Flow:** Webhook ‚Üí Validation ‚Üí Enrichment ‚Üí Qualification ‚Üí CRM/Notifications

## Webhook Configuration

**Endpoint:** `/lead-capture`
**Method:** POST
**Expected Data:**
- email (required)
- firstName
- lastName
- company
- phone
- source
- message

## Data Validation Rules

**Required Fields:**
- Valid email format
- Email not empty

**Optional Enhancement:**
- Phone validation
- Company name validation
- Source validation

## Lead Enrichment

**Clearbit provides:**
- Company size
- Industry
- Technologies used
- Social profiles
- Location data

**‚ö†Ô∏è Security:** API key stored in credentials, not hardcoded!

## Lead Qualification Criteria

**High Priority (Score 80+):**
- Company size >500 employees
- Tech/SaaS industry
- Manager+ title
- Enterprise email domain

**Medium Priority (Score 50-79):**
- Company size 50-500
- Relevant industry
- Business email

**Low Priority (<50):**
- Small company
- Personal email
- Irrelevant industry

## High Priority Lead Actions

**Immediate Actions:**
- Create lead in CRM
- Notify sales team via Slack
- Send personalized welcome email
- Schedule follow-up task

**Data Stored:**
- All enrichment data
- Qualification score & notes
- Source tracking

## Medium/Low Priority Actions

**Medium Priority:**
- Create lead in CRM
- Add to nurture sequence
- Schedule follow-up in 24-48h

**Low Priority:**
- Add to CRM
- Add to long-term nurture
- Monthly check-in

## Error Handling

**Invalid Data Path:**
- Log the invalid data
- Send error notification
- Return 400 status

**Enrichment Failures:**
- Continue with basic data
- Log enrichment errors
- Use fallback scoring

## Required Environment Variables

**üîê Security - No Hardcoded Keys!**

- `APOLLO_API_URL`
- `SLACK_SALES_CHANNEL_ID`
- `SLACK_MARKETING_CHANNEL_ID`
- `CRM_ASSIGNMENT_URL`

**Credentials Required:**
- Clearbit API
- Apollo API (HTTP Header Auth)
- HubSpot API
- Slack API

## Integration Sources

**This webhook can receive leads from:**
- Website contact forms
- Landing page forms
- Facebook Lead Ads
- LinkedIn Lead Gen Forms
- Webinar registrations
- Free trial signups
- Content downloads

**Format:** POST to `/lead-capture`
